alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm wind gusts will impact portions of eastern Musselshell, northeastern Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and Treasure Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Sand Springs to 17 miles northwest of Shepherd. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts over 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hysham, Melstone, Musselshell, Ingomar, Vananda and Bighorn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Treasure
